title: Blue 8

fields.name: Choose one:
fields.value:
- Move 8 spaces forward. Not usable if it would move you past the ‚≠ê **Goal** space.
- Move backwards to the closest <:carpet_blue:1256989199354040403> space. Must have one behind you.

desc: Can be played on top of <:carpet_blue:1256989199354040403> or **8** cards.
